Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits new cannabis dispensaries from opening up within a certain distance from other licensed cannabis dispensaries
Summary: Prohibits new cannabis dispensaries from opening up within five hundred feet of other licensed cannabis dispensaries; provides an exception if the location of such premises is in the public interest.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to prohibiting new cannabis dispensaries from opening up within a certain distance from other licensed cannabis dispensaries
